meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7846.

td.p: Joanna Rom, a docent from Washington, D.C.
Mike Jenkins, an environmental consultant from Ewing, New Jersey
Erik Agard, a puzzlemaker from Gaithersburg, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,201)

tr.td: ARE YOU READY FOR SOME MONDAY NIGHT FOOTBALL?
DOWN____
A EUROPEAN HOLIDAY
NO LONGER AROUND
PIECES OF 8
HERSTORY
